about_the_game:
WORLD OF ART - learn with JIGSAW PUZZLES

presents DLC:

WORLD OF ART: MASTER LEVEL

This DLC is prepared for real Jigsaw Puzzle Masters.

Difficulty level for puzzle connoisseurs with 44 paintings from Monet, Pissarro, van Gogh, Munch, Seurat, Hassam, Twachtman, Edelfelt, Chełmoński, Hasui, Rembrandt, Inness, Shūkō, Boudin and more.

Paintings for Players of all ages.

Enjoy and Relax.
detailed_description:
WORLD OF ART - learn with JIGSAW PUZZLES

presents DLC:

WORLD OF ART: MASTER LEVEL

This DLC is prepared for real Jigsaw Puzzle Masters.

Difficulty level for puzzle connoisseurs with 44 paintings from Monet, Pissarro, van Gogh, Munch, Seurat, Hassam, Twachtman, Edelfelt, Chełmoński, Hasui, Rembrandt, Inness, Shūkō, Boudin and more.

Paintings for Players of all ages.

Enjoy and Relax.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel® i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
